herotitle: Microbit Robotics Classes Beginner Course with Kit

learncoursescard.title: What is Microbit?
learncoursescard.desc: The BBC micro:bit: the pocket-sized computer transforming digital skills learning and enables users to create interactive electronic objects.Microbit kit is included with this course.

learncoursescard.title: Why Python for AI?
learncoursescard.desc: Python has rich library, it is also object oriented, easy to program. It can be also used as frontend language. That’s why it is used in artificial intelligence.

learncoursescard.title: Work with rich python libraries
learncoursescard.desc: Python offers a vast choice of libraries for AI development, which contain base-level items that save coding time. These libraries also make it easy to access, handle, and transform data.

learncoursescard.title: Creative thinking
learncoursescard.desc: Hands on learning experience that promotes children’s creative thinking, teamwork, and problem-solving skills.

learnsyllabus.title: Day 7: Counter – Make A Counter And Add A Timer

learnbenefits.benefit: Microbit improves coding and electronics skills.
Develop efficient problem-solving and coding skills
Design projects that combine hardware and software components to collect and exchange data.
Work with variables, data arrays and cloud data.
Apply critical thinking and develop life skills for the careers of tomorrow.

learncoursescard.title: What is Arduino robotics kit?
learncoursescard.desc: Open-source electronic prototyping platform which enables users to create interactive electronic objects.

learncoursescard.title: Learn while having fun
learncoursescard.desc: Children & adults alike enjoys building things  while using easy to use kit which make them learn 21st century skills

learncoursescard.title: STEAM based learning
learncoursescard.desc: We provide hands-on Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts and Mathematics solutions with lessons that are adaptable to students across all ages and abilities.
